title: Decus High School - decus.mx
p: A online platform that celebrates the power of inclusive education. In decus.mx believe in creating an environment where every learner is valued, supported, and given the tools they need to succeed.

title: Decus / Learn Managmen System
p: Implemented an online platform powered by Moodle. Through design adjustments, training, and a commitment to inclusive education, we have fostered an environment where every learner is valued, supported, and equipped for success.

title: Website for Personal Growth and Mental Well-being
p: Psicologa Argelia D'Amaro, providing professional guidance to enhance emotional well-being and personal growth. Offering effective solutions, manage emotions, improve relationships, and achieve your goals through tailored therapy.
